data.title: The Turner Prize
data.meta_description: About the art prize the Turner Prize, its history and its connection to Tate
data.text:

Winner: Veronica Ryan

2020

The 2020 exhibition was cancelled due to the disruption caused by the coronavirus.

One-off bursaries of £10,000 were awarded to 10 artists instead. Find out more about the bursaries.

2019

Shortlisted artists:

Lawrence Abu Hamdan

Helen Cammock

Oscar Murillo

Tai Shani

Winner

For the first time ever, the award has been given to a collective bringing together the four nominated artists.
